text:
Rejoice People! Avengers: Endgame New Poster Will Make You Believe That Valkyrie Is Still Alive
Rejoice People! Avengers: Endgame New Poster Will Make You Believe That Valkyrie Is Still Alive
A relief moment for all the avengers fans who believed Valkyrie the superwoman played by Hollywood actress Tessa Thompson's has not survived and the new poster of Marvel says she has.
Marvel Studio dropped a number of character posters for Avengers Endgame featuring all the super heroes right from Captain America, Iron Man, Bruce Banner, Thor, Hawk-eye, Ant-Man, Nebula, Rocket, War Machine to Captain Marvel, all the living characters are featured prominently in the new solo posters.
Instagram
But one poster that caught our attention is a solo poster of Valkyrie. Yes! Ever since we saw Thanos Snap his finger in Avengers : Infinity War, with the Infinity Gauntlet and killed all the half living beings from the universe, many assumed if Tessa Thompson's Valkyrie will survive. Well, the answer it right here.
Don't Miss 2.5 K SHARES 1.7 K SHARES 1 K SHARES 130 SHARES 289 SHARES
Well it's welcoming to see Tessa's poster as the confirmation that she is very much alive and is a part of Avengers Endgame. The fans too couldn't contain their excitement and are screaming with joy on her survival.
Instagram
Clearly with Tessa's survival there is going to be more surprises and we are damn excited to witness it on April 26, 2019. How excited are you? Drop your comments in the box below.
title: Rejoice People! Avengers: Endgame New Poster Will Make You Believe That Valkyrie Is Still Alive
